The claim falsely states that the CARES: implying that the COVID-19 pandemic was planned or known about in advance.
The CARES Act was actually introduced on: 2020, as a substitute amendment to an unrelated existing tax bill, not as a separate bill.
The original bill: the Middle Class Health Benefits Tax Repeal Act of 2019, had been languishing in the Senate since the summer and was resurrected by Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell to serve as the vehicle for the CARES Act.
